alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 30 at 2:28AM MST until January 30 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Carry a winter survival kit as very cold wind chills in remote areas along SR-30 through this morning will be dangerous in the event of vehicle trouble.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
